mapper.select: select tm.id,tm.perms,tm.pid,tm.text,tm.type,tm.url from t_menu tm LEFT JOIN t_role_menu trm ON tm.id=trm.menuId LEFT JOIN t_role tr ON trm.roleId=tr.id LEFT JOIN t_user_role tur ON tr.id = tur.roleId LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tur.userId = tu.id where tm.type !=1 AND tu.id=#{value}
